channel.title: [508/525] Iscape development team
channel.description:
Hello, and welcome to my development team page. I am look for several spots. If you feel that you are up to the job, then create an application. I will quickly read through it and respond swiftly. I hope that you are interested and best of luck!
Spots: Sever-side Coder: Me Client-side Coder: Open Website Manager: Open Publicity: Open In-Game Admin: Open In-Game Mod: Open In-Game Mod: Open
[size=14pt]More About Our Server...[/size] Our server in progress is a top notch PVP server. Let me take you through it from the start. When you first start the server, you will set your skills, maybe read the rules, buy your gear, and go the the PVP battleground of your choice. There is Safepk and DangerPK. In SafePk you will fight with other people not for gear, but for score. Your score goes up with every kill and down with every death. When you kill someone, the points that you receive depend on the level of your opponents. Let's say that you set your skills to range, go buy range gear, kill a couple people, and get bored of ranging. Well you can easily reset your skills in your quest tab. Let's say your melee now and you want to risk it all to gain other people's gear. (gear does cost) You would go to dangerpk where you can loose everything (except for 3(unless your skulled)) or gain everything. In DangerPk there will be no running (or in SafePK) and you cant teleport in combat. You will have to face your fears. You will be able to buy everything you want, the best of items (with a few exceptions for donations) for 1 million gp a piece. You will start the game off with 25 million. To make money kill other people.
[size=14pt]What Each Job Does...[/size] Client-Side Coder: Your job will be to better the client. Your goals will to be reach a HD Webclient, and to manage it to your best of your ability.
Website Manager: Your job will to create a website and manage it. You will be able to get creative, and add ads. You will be watching over the website and forums. When (not if) we get big if you will need any forum moderators you will be in charge of what they do, and who we hire.
Publicity: Your job will to create gfx, banners, and ads. You will need to sprend the news of our server. You will stimulate the community. You are the head of all publicity.
In-Game Admin: Your Job is to watch over the server, catch cheaters, stop hackers, make sure every individual is respected and respects others. You are in charge of the in-game mods. You will also watch for what the people what. You are the Admin of the server. Also when we get big, if you will need more, you will be in charge of picking who gets the spot, and you will the head admin.
In-Game Mod: Your Job is to make sure that players respect others and are respected, you will also watch over the server, but your main job is to make sure that every player has fun.
[size=14pt]Application Format[/size] Name? Aol\Skype\teamviewer\etc? What you are applying for? Why do you think that your the man for the job?
[size=14pt]Updated Features:[/size] 100% Player Killing 100% Safe Pk 100% Danger PK 100% Safe Score Quest Tab Finished Shops finished --[1/4/2011] Updated login -- [1/5/2011] Changed Starter -- [1/5/2011] Fixed a Couple of Glitches -- [1/6/2011] Made More Stable -- [1/6/2011] Fixed Shop Glitches -- [1/7/2011] Added Consumable Shop -- [1/7/2011]
[size=14pt]Pictures:[/size] [img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/3416/11018007.png[/img] [img]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/6198/83348191.png[/img] [img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/5201/15433621.png[/img] [img]http://img814.imageshack.us/img814/5695/23441983.png[/img]
Thank You Very Much...

item.title: [508/525] Iscape development team
item.dc:creator: @Faze2 Faze ©
item.description:
@Faze2 wrote:

[center]Name:
Faze / Jamie

Aol\Skype\teamviewer\etc:
MSN - Faze_@live.co.uk
Skype - i_am_faze
I also have Ventrilo.

What you are applying for:
Website manager if you are going to use vBulletin.
Server/forum administrator if you are not.

Why do you think that your the man for the job:
I have a lot of experience with managing servers, I’ve been every position you can think of, except a developer. I will be active, helpful, consistent, fair and much more, which will be a great help to the server, forums, and the community. I will be able to watch over the community and make sure that everybody is having a good time playing the server, and that rule-breakers are seen to and punished. I will be fair though, and I will never be biased. The server will be the first thing I go to when I come on my laptop, and the last thing I visit before I turn it off. I don’t know what else to say, however if you would like to know more then please contact me on MSN so that we may speak in further detail.

Thanks.[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: [508/525] Iscape development team
item.dc:creator: @halolouis halolouis
item.description:
@halolouis wrote:

@ abdullah
I am a very strong programmer. I would be fine joining your team but first I would like to let you know that I spent over 7 months (yes 7 months of coding not of pretending to do stuff) building a 508 into an insane server. I have basically done the following: (to the best that I can remember… there are tons…)

Perfected mining and woodcutting (Your character looks at the rock while he mines it and time/lvl/pick calculations. as well as rock/tree depletion and replacement)

Construction… Legit. You can do everything u can in real rs. (I would just have to show u…)

The usual. (Fletching. Firemaking. Runecrafting (with multiple and combo runes) and all those gay skills)

Hunter… Yes I did make hunter just like rs. (Place trap wait for chin to approach. Chin attacks. You catch him. Bleep bleep.

Flood protection. (this one took like literally 3 and 1/2 minutes… Don’t know why every1 is scared of it…)

pvp points… nothing new.

Grand exchange. (Not credited by me tbh. I got the base code from mithscape and had to basically port it over… But I did make huge changes to it(Define huge))

Fishing… (Fishes are caught based on level and difficulty)

Farming… (different plants take different times(potatos take like 8 seconds and trees take like 27 minutes) (and you CAN watch them grow through all of the like 8-9 stages) (and you are alarmed when the growth is finished.) (But I was to lazy to make loots so once they grow u pick them for cash rofl.))

Smithing… (I hate this skill because I removed bronze in my server to add things like dragon plate and full helm. (So I planed on shifting everything down and at higher lvls u make dragon or somtin))

Combat… (I fixed lvl + armor + weapon calculation to match runescape. (Also I ddnt effing do everything with if-statements. I is not stoopid!) (I fixed the combat to better fit game ticks. Everyone else had dagger and bandos godsword slash at the same speed…))

Npc clipping… (this one was tricky and gay. Took me like 1 1/2 hours to code it. And like another 3 hours to store every location that is clipped.) (508 clipping in real rs is server side and so is mine. But you have to go to every location u want clipped and type ::cl (if ur admin) or ::cd (to delete clip)) (The clips are stored as a matrix. and only the stores clips are tested and stores. So it only takes like 1 megabyte of ram and no cpu. Its awesome and I have not seen another server even attempt that :] )

Player following/attacking player clipping follows the same lines as the last one.

(p.s. If ur wondering what about clipping in the rest of the game… Just wanted to say… Thats client side. I don’t need to do that. But U can do periodic checks to see if some1 is hacking clipping though =] )

Magic. (I added every single magic skill. And effing sound(the correct sounds) to every one) Barrages barrage like rs and sht

Sound. I added a crap load of sounds to actions. (equip armor. Different weapon sounds. Whip. daggers. maces. scimis. flail. bgs. magic attacks. bows. knives. ect)

Doors. I coded doors to open and close and removed it like a day later. It worked but why not just remove doors… Thats what I did atleast. Removed them.

Fixed object re-creation. 508 has a problem with spawning global objects in wrong loations… I fixed that problem.

Now I am gonna be straight. I HAVE NOT FIXED THE NPC BUG. (The whole reason I got pissed at the server and stopped coding!) The bug that seems to at random when too many npcs are on the client at once. The client crashes with an error… Ld client. Hd client. anyclient. So I know it is a server sending something wrong but I can’t place my finger on where.

HD and Fullscreen. Yes I added hd and full screen and a runescape music player

Anyways, There is more but I am boring myself and ur probly not even gonna respond nor is this community generally serious about any project (with exception to a few). My point is that I myself coded all of those and plenty more on a 508 so I am capable. I am looking for a partner with good programming skills and maybe his own server that we can merge. Basically, I would like to merge our servers together and create something bigger than we could have done alone. But my requirement is that every member of a certain spot gets equal as every other member. (unless they obviously did less) That means NO lead programmer. Tasks are discussed across all programmers and separated and completed. Every dollar earned over $75 monthly gets separated into every persons wage. With no single person making all the dough.

Would like to discuss. Might end up creating a team if u refuse. Anyways, cheers. Btw I am 19, in USA, The name: Louis a.k.a. halolouie.

Read full topic

item.title: [508/525] Iscape development team
item.dc:creator: @abdullah abdullah
item.description:
@abdullah wrote:

Hello, and welcome to my development team page. I am look for several spots. If you feel that you are up to the job, then create an application. I will quickly read through it and respond swiftly. I hope that you are interested and best of luck!

Spots:
Sever-side Coder: Me
Client-side Coder: Open
Website Manager: Open
Publicity: Open
In-Game Admin: Open
In-Game Mod: Open
In-Game Mod: Open

[size=14pt]More About Our Server…[/size]
Our server in progress is a top notch PVP server. Let me take you through it from the start. When you first start the server, you will set your skills, maybe read the rules, buy your gear, and go the the PVP battleground of your choice. There is Safepk and DangerPK. In SafePk you will fight with other people not for gear, but for score. Your score goes up with every kill and down with every death. When you kill someone, the points that you receive depend on the level of your opponents. Let’s say that you set your skills to range, go buy range gear, kill a couple people, and get bored of ranging. Well you can easily reset your skills in your quest tab. Let’s say your melee now and you want to risk it all to gain other people’s gear. (gear does cost) You would go to dangerpk where you can loose everything (except for 3(unless your skulled)) or gain everything. In DangerPk there will be no running (or in SafePK) and you cant teleport in combat. You will have to face your fears. You will be able to buy everything you want, the best of items (with a few exceptions for donations) for 1 million gp a piece. You will start the game off with 25 million. To make money kill other people.

[size=14pt]What Each Job Does…[/size]
Client-Side Coder:
Your job will be to better the client. Your goals will to be reach a HD Webclient, and to manage it to your best of your ability.

Website Manager:
Your job will to create a website and manage it. You will be able to get creative, and add ads. You will be watching over the website and forums. When (not if) we get big if you will need any forum moderators you will be in charge of what they do, and who we hire.

Publicity:
Your job will to create gfx, banners, and ads. You will need to sprend the news of our server. You will stimulate the community. You are the head of all publicity.

In-Game Admin:
Your Job is to watch over the server, catch cheaters, stop hackers, make sure every individual is respected and respects others. You are in charge of the in-game mods. You will also watch for what the people what. You are the Admin of the server. Also when we get big, if you will need more, you will be in charge of picking who gets the spot, and you will the head admin.

In-Game Mod:
Your Job is to make sure that players respect others and are respected, you will also watch over the server, but your main job is to make sure that every player has fun.

[size=14pt]Application Format[/size]
Name?
Aol\Skype\teamviewer\etc?
What you are applying for?
Why do you think that your the man for the job?

[size=14pt]Updated Features:[/size]
100% Player Killing
100% Safe Pk
100% Danger PK
100% Safe Score

Added Consumable Shop – [1/7/2011]

[size=14pt]Pictures:[/size]



Thank You Very Much…
